Description_lang: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice by $/1000;s1 sec.

description_blz.en_US: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice by 10 sec.

description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 10 s a recarga do seu Martelo da Justiça.

description_blz.en_GB: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice by 10 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce el tiempo de reutilización de tu Martillo de Justicia 10 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit le temps de recharge de votre Marteau de la justice de 10 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il tempo di recupero di Martello della Giustizia di 10 s.

description_blz.zh_TW: 使你制裁之錘的冷卻時間縮短10秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的制裁之锤的冷却时间缩短10秒。
